summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multi-part enhancement features: A) Renamed headers, B) Customize/Rearrange Columns modals with persistence, C) STATUS editable dropdown, D) Eye icon action buttons. All 13 backend tests passed (100%) and all frontend tests passed (100%).
passed_tests: A: Today table headers show REG NO (renamed from VEH REG NO)
A: Today table headers show OTS (renamed from OTS NO)
A: Today table headers show SERVICE TYPE (renamed from TYPE OF SERVICE)
A: Today table headers show SA NAME (renamed from ALLOCATED SA NAME)
A: Upcoming table headers show REG NO (not Vehicle Reg No)
B: Customize Columns button visible on Today page
B: Customize Columns modal opens with 5 checkboxes (MAIL ID, DOCKET READINESS, N-1, STATUS, CRE NAME)
B: Unchecking a column in Customize modal hides that column from table
B: Rearrange Columns button visible on Today page
B: Rearrange Columns modal opens with draggable column list (18 items)
B: Column preferences persist after page refresh (saved to backend API)
B: Customize and Rearrange buttons present on Upcoming page
B: Upcoming Customize modal has correct checkboxes (status, n1_status, docket_ready)
B: Customize and Rearrange buttons present on History page
B: History Customize modal has correct checkbox (status only)
C: STATUS cell in Today table is a Select dropdown (6 dropdowns found)
C: STATUS dropdown shows Day's Outcome options (Reported, Rescheduled, Cancelled, No-show)
C: Selecting a Day's Outcome option updates the appointment via API
C: STATUS dropdown update persists after page refresh
D: Eye icon action buttons visible on Today (6 buttons found)
D: Eye icon action buttons visible on Upcoming (12 buttons found)
D: Eye icon action buttons visible on History (15 buttons found)
D: Clicking eye button navigates to /appointments/{id}
Backend: GET /api/user-preferences/today returns 401 without auth
Backend: GET /api/user-preferences/today returns preferences object with auth
Backend: PUT /api/user-preferences/today saves and persists preferences
Backend: GET /api/user-preferences/upcoming works
Backend: PUT /api/user-preferences/upcoming saves preferences
Backend: GET /api/user-preferences/history works
Backend: PUT /api/user-preferences/history saves preferences
Backend: Preferences include user/page context for isolation
Backend: Hidden columns can be cleared (empty array)
Backend: PUT /api/appointments/{id} updates appointment_day_outcome (STATUS)
Backend: Settings contain appointment_day_outcomes options
Backend: GET /api/appointments/{id} returns appointment detail
Backend: GET /api/appointments/nonexistent returns 404
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Used existing appointment data.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All multi-part enhancement features working: renamed headers across Today/Upcoming/History, Customize Columns modal with per-page checkboxes, Rearrange Columns with drag-and-drop, STATUS editable dropdown linked to Day's Outcome settings, Eye icon action buttons navigating to appointment detail. Column preferences stored in MongoDB user_preferences collection with user_id and page isolation. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_user_preferences.py cover all user-preferences endpoints.

renamed_headers.reg_no: REG NO displayed (was VEH REG NO)
renamed_headers.service_type: SERVICE TYPE displayed (was TYPE OF SERVICE)
renamed_headers.sa_name: SA NAME displayed (was ALLOCATED SA NAME)

customize_columns.persistence: Preferences saved to /api/user-preferences/{page} and persist across refresh
